title: Introduction
description: A large proportion of the world's disease burden00395-3/fulltext#text=GBD%202019%20confirmed%20that%20a,a%20reduction%20in%20the%20burden) is attributable to mental disorders. In fact mental disorders are among the leading causes.  An important aspect of the mental health treatment gap is the diagnostic gap00673-5/fulltext) (i.e., the proportion of the population with a condition who remain undiagnosed).
